A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was certainly not what I thought it would be at first\, but after taking some time to reflect I feel it has a very strong and important message. Admittedly I was angry at first\, I left the theater feeling empty\, but after really analyzing I've decided I  like it more and more as I think. Over all this is a great StarWars film and is a very intelligent addition to the franchise. Just don't go on with any expectations what so ever. That will be your downfall as it was mine.
